item.title: TryHackMe - Oracle 9
item.author: mohamed.anaddam@outlook.com (azadin)
item.description: My designation is Oracle 9, I carry with me a sealed transmission. Title Oracle 9 Description My designation is Oracle 9, I carry with me a sealed transmission.. Points 0 Difficulty Easy Maker Maxablancas Summary Dreaming: in this machine we exploit a vulnerable AI chatbot, it has a sealed transmission and we should somehow trick it to get it to reveal it to us.
